snippet: The company is struggling with sluggish emerging markets like China.
abstract: Cisco Systems reports fiscal second-quarter profit of $1.4 billion, down 55 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue fell 8 percent to $11.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company is struggling with sluggish emerging markets like China.

headline.main: Facing Questions on Future, Cisco Posts a Revenue Drop
headline.print_headline: Facing Questions on Future, Cisco Posts a Revenue Drop
